title: # 522 - Kevin Ryan, H. Foley (Are You Garbage?) & ME
itunes:title: # 522 - Kevin Ryan, H. Foley (Are You Garbage?) & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with Kevin Ryan & H. Foley from the “Are You Garbage?” Podcast. We talk about things that live up to the hype, college life, pizza wars, the 10k roulette bet, their weight loss challenge, air bnb fines, and much more!

 

Follow “Are You Garbage?”

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/areyougarbage 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/AreYouGarbage 

 

This episode is brought to you by Wine Enthusiast. Go to http://www.wineenthusiast.com or text “BERT” to 511511 for the 4th of July Wine Cellar & Furniture sale. 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Lectric eBikes. Go to http://www.lectricebikes.com and use the code “BERT” for a free bike lock with any bike purchase.

 

This episode is also brought to you by Hello Tushy. Get 10% off plus free shipping at http://www.hellotushy.com/bertcast

 

This episode is also brought to you by Better Help. Get 10% off your first month with the discount code “BERT”. Get started today at http://www.betterhelp.com/bert 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Black Buffalo Zero. Go to http://www.blackbuffalo.com and use the code “BERT” at checkout for 15% off your first order. 

 

This episode is brought to you by Ladder. Go to http://www.ladderlife.com/bert to find out if you’re approved today!

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
